sitePreferences.name: Enable Infinite Scroll
sitePreferences.description: This Boolean toggles the option for infinite scrolling or pagination from within the search grid.

sitePreferences.name: Enable MultiShipping
sitePreferences.description: The attribute is used to enable/disable Multi-Shipment Checkout for each site via BM.

sitePreferences.name: Enable In Store Pickup
sitePreferences.description: This Boolean enables the storefront ability to perform tasks related to in store orders

sitePreferences.name: Slide Slow effect
sitePreferences.description: Please visit http://jquery.malsup.com/cycle/browser.html for complete visual effects

sitePreferences.name: Free Shipping Coupon Code
sitePreferences.description: This is used in the cart to override the error message that shows up

sitePreferences.name: PayPal Mobile User Action Commit
sitePreferences.description: Commit Mobile transaction on PayPal Side

sitePreferences.name: Paypal Enabled
sitePreferences.description: This switch allows to enable/disable Paypal for Payment.

sitePreferences.name: IP Values Used to Enable Employee Pricing
